en: " In a base you can build all available Buildings. It can have up to [i]7 subterran layers[/i] and a surface layer.\nIf you build a new base it will always consist of the surface layer and 1 subsurface layer.\n[b]Protect your bases at all costs
column3: you will loose the game if your last base is destroyed![/b]\nFor each level you dig down
column4: the structures build there will take less damage from attacking UFOs.\nBuildings on the surface (including the elevator) take full damage and for each layer the damage is reduced by 50%. "

en: " The outpost is a small and cheap version of the base
column3: that is primary used for radarposts.\nOutposts don't have subsurface layers
column4: and therefor are [b]limited to buildings that can be build on the surface[/b] (you cannot build hangars). "

en: ""CARRY" is the base class for objects you can carry in a ground combat."
""STORE" is the base class for objects you can store in a base."
""STORE" is the base class for objects you can store in a base."
